attributes.action: create state of the art 'youth villages ' which is a collection of skatebording parks , ice-skating rinks , football astro -turfs , mini malls , painting rooms where children can get creative , DJ rooms where children can become creative and other interesting things put together for children . these youth villages should be built in recreation areas in every town of the uk. this will prevent crime as it will motivate their interests away from crime
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
